column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Natasha - Thank you for your excellent review. We appreciate your recommendations and your business. We Â do regret that due to our demand at peak hours
column2: we must strictly enforce our seating policy. We do have six JINYA locations throughout the greater Houston area
column3: all of which are usually much less crowded than Midtown. Regardless
column4: we appreciate your kind words and hope you'll come back through again soon!
